name: Modesta Carpenter
text:
Awesome pizza and great service!
Definitely going back! :)

name: Phil Nungesser
text: I would not recommend this Mellow Mushroom location. I had a very bad experience with their staff and was treated rudely by several of them. I ordered online and requested curbside pickup. My pizza was $30 and I added a 20% tip on. When I …More

name: Pyo Kang
text: Always had a great experience here from dine in (pre covid) to take out during covid.

name: Bryan T
text: Great sevice. Unexciting subs. Expensive beers.

name: Melvin Witherspoon
text: Margherita styled pizza at mellow mushroom blew my mind.

name: Barbz inthecity
text: Quick pizza & drinks! The wings are really good too!

name: Christopher T Hill
text: We used to get mellow mushroom all the time when we lived in Conyers but ever since moving to Midtown the pizza has been bad time after time not only is the crust burnt the pizza wasn’t really made well and also was cut so oddly. You cut a …More

name: Jason Miller
text: I love Mellow Mushroom and will keep trying but my 2 last deliveries have not been too great. Over cooked and a cheese line that left about 3 inches of crust at the top edge of the pizza.

name: Sagar Thakker
text: The pizza was half cooked we had a large with veggies on it. The second large buffalo chicken was a fantastic pizza. Just poorly cut. Just a heads up y'all can do better in the middle of midtown.

name: Jasmine Daniel
text: It was a chill environment and service was great! I think our server was Samuel. Pizza was great and the cinnamon honey pretzel bits. He was awesome! Ask for him.

name: Tiffani Patterson
text: This was a great spot to grab a tasty meal on the patio and listen to some good music. The server was attentive and friendly and the food was good. This was an overall good experience.

name: Deaf Emily
text: Fun place to eat. I had waiter Jacob. He was wonderful to us!  The food is champ!   Suggestions: I think that the hand towel receptacle is perched too high on the wall and not quite accessible for wheelchair users or small children.  My …More

name: Stefan Attaway
text: Service is fast, drinks are strong, and the pizza is fantastic with an old fashion real oven flavor.  Me and my date shared a small after a couple of drinks and we brought the rest home. Generous toppings is the icing.

name: jeannette thompson
text: Surprisingly good pizza, we will return.

name: Monica Mora
text: Food was delicious, never wrong to go there for a good meal

name: Joey Rudzinski
text:
Not a fan of parking. But good beer selection.
Decent vegan selection.
Good service

name: juan cardona
text: Fun atmosphere super laid back. We also had a wonderful server really made the experience fun. We split two large pizzas and it was enough to feed 7 of us. Food was out very quickly and was extremely hot.

name: Sean Standberry
text: They didn’t put chicken on one side of pizza. 3 employees directed their fingers at the pizza. Literally the worst experience I ever had. For the cost of the pizza, it isn’t worth it. Will never return

name: William DeArmon
text: We like coming here but last visit (today) was marginal at best. I would give it less than 3 stars for our visit today, but since we've never had a problem before this visit I'll stick with a 3 star. …More

name: happyg7891
text: Placed an order for pick up, arrived 5 minutes past the quoted time. Had to wait another 15 minutes because they forgot the pepperoni cheese bread. I'm not sure if this is a joke or what.... I could have made this in my microwave at home. This is just sad.

name: Brianne Rogers
text: This is literally my favorite place to get pizza. It doesn't make you feel all gross and it doesn't give you heartburn. It's light, and delicious. The salads are so awesome, and so is the overall atmosphere. I don't know why this place …More

name: Wanda Maxwell
text: Nice but understaffed... The people working there super nice and are hard working just could use one more there with them especially at lunch time.  If you go try the pretzel bites there sauce is to die for... Worth a visit if you love pizza!

name: Sarah Ha
text:
Pretzel bites are the best! I highly recommend getting them.
Pizza was good too. Staff are nice except for the creepy drunken customers.

name: Peter Recknagel
text: If you are a fan of pizza and classic rock you will have fun at this restaurant. Laid back 60s feel.  Good service along with good prices.  Easy to find and rarely any significant wait for a table  A good place to relax with friends.

name: Tim Sherwood
text: If you like Mellow Mushroom as a chain (which I do) you will probably like this one.

name: freddy d
text: Visited during lunch time and was able to get serve quickly and food was good. Atmosphere is as name implies "mellow"....

name: Seth Eisenberg
text: Pizzas were great. Cool flavor combinations that worked well together. Service was friendly and we really enjoyed the chill and laid back atmosphere in there

name: S.H R.
text: Okay if I could give this location zero stars I would. However I can't. My experience with my family was horrible. I came in today and was seated fast which was perfect. But after we ordered, we received our food nearly after an hour later. …More

name: Crix Miller
text: I really enjoyed myself, the buffalo chicken pizza was amazing. Omar was very helpful and had great knowledge of the menu. Can't wait to come back midtown rocks!

name: Carter Shadden
text: Good service and good food. Easy to find parking and you can sit outdoors when the weather is good.

name: benjamin johnson
text: Natalie is literally the best bartender of all time! Food is great service is better!

name: Nathan
text: Good food, reasonable prices. Staff was not the most accommodating or prompt with followup, and overall seemed very disinterested outside of the kitchen with customers. With all the other pizza places out there, I'm sure you'll find a better experience elsewhere.

name: r long
text: A patron came in with a dog in his arms, which was not a service animal. I requested to speak to the manager. A friend of that dog owner verbally accosted me. I should have called the police as I was fearful for my life. The manager came …More

name: Grace
text: Don't order to-go here because you'll have to eat bruschetta WITHOUT THE BALSAMIC. So basically diced tomatoes and bread. Great food usually, but not a very organized establishment. I wish I could get a refund but that would probably take 30 minutes at the least! But other than that, my pretzel bites were good. Thanks.

name: Diana Delany
text: The food at the Atlanta IHop was very delicious and I'd recommend it to others that enjoy a good breakfast.

name: Tenshi
text: The vegan cheese didn't taste good unfortunately. Had to scrape the cheese off and eat the rest but that cheese flavor is still pretty strong. Maybe the regular cheese pizzas are better.

name: Megan Robison
text: I come to this Mellow Mushroom all the time! Great local beers are on tap, and their service is excellent. I highly recommend the patio in the warmer months.

name: DeShawn Nicole
text: Bought a pizza to go...decided we wanted to stay...just for them to tell us that we couldn't eat inside because we got it to go! I will NEVER patronize them again!!! We spent $40 for them to tell us that we had to eat outside.🤬

name: TheBunnychildChannel
text: Mellow Mushroom restaurants usually are pretty good, and this one is no exception. The service is quick and professional, and the food is delicious. When I’m in the area, and I’m in the mood for pizza, this is my choice.

name: Emanuel Jones
text: Atmosphere was nice and the restaurant was clean. Food was great. Waitress accidentally forgot to place our order in a timely manner, though she apologized and gave us a free salad while we waited.

name: Mark Lindsey
text: Draft beer is ridiculously expensive, $9.75 / glass for local craft beer. Will not return. Good luck!

name: Gary Ray
text: Great calzones & pizza. Beer selection is fairly decent as well. Pickup or dine in. Especially good choices if you are vegetarian. Prices are comparable to other pizza places.

name: Brandon Kuni
text: The pizza is good. I will say that, probably my favorite buffalo chicken in town. However I usually get to go from here and I feel the service over the phone and at the counter could be better. To be fair I don't think I have ever dined in at this location.

name: Angiebeth Ortiz
text: Food is great, however, service is lacking more attention. A lot more. As someone who's worked in retail, as a chef, and currently doing sales, I know how important customer service is to keep a business going. I understand that working in …More

name: Juliana Marie Edge Stewart
text: I've been here only twice but both times the food has been smashing. The funky trippy decor is fun and the service is usually very prompt.

name: Jay Darcy
text: Standard offering from the eclectic pizza chain. Average service, typically a little slow. Solid place for a slice, but nothing to get excited about.

name: Ms. B
text: FOOD/DRINKS: The menu is is pretty extensive and there are a lot of choice options. I always get the gluten free pizza. Yes it is smaller and more expensive but this is to be expected for any place that offers gluten free food. I've also …More

name: Christopher Fletcher
text: The food and service was very good.

name: Rob Hutchins
text: It has been a long time since I've eaten here and the pizza is still great.   They also have some interesting sounding sandwiches on the menu.

name: REBELDE URBANO
text: Pizza needs a tad more sauce, and definitely an update on the decor.

name: She’s Organic
text: Spinach artichoke dip & bread! With some pizza... Mm mm yes! Staff if young so service could improve but overall they try!

name: Danelle Dautrieve Sanford
text: Ate here twice and was pleasantly surprised.  Nice service.  Walking distance from Trader Joes  and  Plaza Theatre.  Also near Ponce City Market.  If you are on a budget eat her first before going to Ponce City Market.

name: IAmYaminah Inc.
text: They serve a really good calzone.

name: Bonnie Roberts
text: food was good, the host was nice, manager came and ckecked on us, but our server was not good. had to ask for, straws, water, bill, she did not ask if all food was one bill, had to go and ask her for to go box and pay bill.

name: E Solla
text: We ordered on their website for delivery, which we selected deliberately and input our address and delivery tip with a big group over. We would not have ordered otherwise. We called when an hr fifteen had passed to check on the status and …More

name: doris massengill
text: I called in at around 9 knowing that I will not arrive until about 9:20 p.m. I first asked if I can reserve a table, I was told no because it was too busy. I think fair enough so I place an order. I arrive at around 9:20 and I walk up to …More

name: Alexander Khoa Nguyen
text: Dogs are not welcomed on the patio here.....weird policy considering it's on the beltline and all the other restaurants in the same plaza welcome dogs on the patio. Hope they reconsider this policy

name: Read Walters
text: Generally good experience. This place is well maintained and clean. I received pretty mediocre service however.

name: shon butler
text: Good pizza was delicious. Atmosphere was great. Nice small place to eat and drink

name: Noel Siksai
text: Always good but very busy.

name: Faye Henderson
text: Best service.

name: Daniel Evers
text: First Mellow mushroomer. Love the pizza and salads! Great wait staff and lots to choose from the menu. Will be coming back!

name: Azure Blue
text: They have excellent Vegan opitions!

name: Sileena Mathis
text: Really good pizza and friendly staff

name: Leah Dick
text:
Edited:
Revisited this location after emailing with the manager. Our server was incredibly sweet, especially after hearing about our previously poor experience. The …More

name: Jessica Burnett
text: Pizza time! Pizza was yummy. My friends beers were bubbling over the brim. I get my buzz from cheezy dough and boy was it delicious. Veggie pizza is the way to go. The salads are also good and they offer vegan cheese.

name: Cliff Freiwald
text: Greek salad is awesome and the "small" is actually quite large. House special pizza was delicious.

name: Eric Blanchard
text: They consistently have the best pizza

name: Beth Tedder
text: Love the bartenders and staff!  Great pizza and salads, too!

name: Drew Hardy
text: What a disappointment. I order pizza from this location extremely frequently and have had great experiences until now. I called at about 6PM to place an order for pick up, and from the get-go the woman who answered made it very clear that …More

name: Amanda Smith
text: Doesn’t get much better than Mellow, keep up the good work.

name: Hannah Murschel
text: Food was great but service was very slow. The staff was cool and nice, but we were sat for almost 30 minute before anyone even came to greet us and take our drink order.

name: Nicholas Bennett
text: The trivia here is great

name: Liz Jones
text: The service was good. The food was terrible and overpriced.  The atmosphere is horrible, I couldn't even here the people sitting next to me.

name: greg peek
text: I really do love the food

name: Benjamin McClendon
text: My girlfriend and I always get the caesar salad pizza. It's the best pizza, hands down

name: Leah Mattix
text: Michael was literally 10's across the board! 👏

name: Clara Walker
text: Worst possible ever. Ordered large regular crust with spinach and pepperoni.  Had to drown it with garlic powder and  pamasan cheese just to get my pizza to taste somewhat decent.

name: RandolphOwens Development
text: Best pizza hands down

name: Breann
text: The pizza was on par with what you expect, but the service was really bad. Pretty sure our waiter was high?

name: Mattison Lewis
text: Great pizza but rude AF.

name: Tonya Meyer
text: Nice staff, great food!!

name: haylee scott
text: I just don’t have many good experiences at this Mellow. The food is great, once you finally get it after a long wait. The most irritating part is being put on hold for 5+ minutes when calling in an order for pick-up, and then being told …More

name: Paul Varelans
text: New thi wings yummy

name: Gabriel Martinez
text: Very rude lady cashier, she is a black female with very horrible customer service skills. I wonder how she even got a position there. Oh and she was rude to almost every customer there. Pizza was pretty good, sauce was almost ice cold.

name: Patricia A Green
text: Clean, great service, tasty pizza, a little pricey. Would go back again.

name: Chris Hermansen
text: Smaller than other Mellows I’ve been to but still great food and a fun atmosphere.

name: Lisa Jones
text: Vibes were great.

name: Alexis Hewitt
text: Good service and good food every time I come.

name: kristy robb
text: Atmosphere is loud but service is great and their food is amazing! Make sure to try their pretzels with beer battered cheese.

name: Joey Goodall
text: Outdoor and indoor seating and lots of toppings on their pizza. The crust is slightly sweet - definitely unique pizza. The service can be a little slow and. But Trivia Night on Mondays!

name: Lisa Sligh
text: Dana was wonderful! She turned our messed up plans into an amazing time! Great service

name: jay howard
text: Great place to bring the kids for a slice.

name: Christopher McIntyre
text: Excellent service, food, and atmosphere

name: Nijae Lopez
text: The booth was dirty service was slow and my pizza was cold wont be back $31.57 for the great white what a rip off mellow mushroom has fallen off

name: arisbeth santos
text: Their "Thai" addition isn'tt too bad

name: Brittany W
text: Tasty. Usually no wait and a really nice wait staff.

name: Rachel Malina
text: Great salads and pizza. Are super cool about modifying ingredients!

name: Patricia Botero Motta
text: Three stars for the customer service. Good place if you want quantity than quality. Good spot to take a beer, drinks some pitchers and talk with your friends.

name: Scott Joseph
text: Best crust in Atlanta. Bartender was on point as well.

name: Lisa Tanner
text: Mellow Mushroom Midtown is my favorite pizza joint! Love the food and the staff! Fresh ingredients and great bar!

name: Shaun McLane
text: Fast service, great pizza, friendly staff!

name: Daisy Davidow
text: Great food. I love the crust on this pizza.

name: gypsy seoul
text: Lady at the bar with the accent is so rude I came in to have a good time she really made me so sad her energy was very low I don’t see why she’s so mean she really needs to be fired she made my family sad too

name: Wil Character
text: Great food.

name: Roopak Venkatakrishnan
text: Have always loved their pies. The mushroom veggie pie is just amazing. I love their sweet tea too. Amazing service just completes the experience. One of my favorite chains

name: alexis brase
text: I love the staff.. Beautiful staff (especially that one pizza chef.. Yum!).. Natalie knows how to run this joint! I love that woman!! Pizza is divine.

name: Phillip Walker
text: Good food. Friendly staff.

name: Kelly Parry
text: Mellow Mushroom is an all-time favorite of mine. The pizza is well-made and they have good salads as well. Don't miss throwback prices day, when everything is priced as it was in 1974 when Mellow Mushroom first opened!

name: Lanesha Sutton
text: The service was ok but I did not get what I asked for at all. I ordered a burger well done with potato wedges, my food was brought out the potatoes were cold and my burger was pink. I asked the waitress to please get me some fresh potatoes …More

name: Cherry Frederick
text: Too many other great pizza places nearby to waste your time here. I've had brown lettuce, wrong orders on a carry out, etc., I tried the lunch special and it took a really long time because of kitchen problems. I really wish it was worth it because it's a really convenient location.

name: Janette Pierce-Perryman
text: Awesome Holy Shitake pizza today!

name: James
text: Wanted a beer and ended up spending $20 on 2 glasses of beer. Really?

name: ben ni
text: Good food and customer service

name: Dora Murphy
text: Beautiful, peaceful and talented staff.

name: James W Bledsoe
text: I love this place the food is  hot and always fresh  the beer selection is magnificent  😍😍😍😍

name: Hollywood Jett
text: I will NEVER go to this place again .. Terrible customer service

name: J Brown
text: Pizza is always good but service at this location is lacking. Ordered a pizza on website at 7:10, online process said it would be ready at 7:44. Get there at 7:45 and they forgot (?) to make the pizza. I suggest calling in as they don't seem to have to system to confirm online ordering.

name: Jr Harrison
text: If you have not had Mellow Mushroom, you are missing out on life. They do have GF pizza by the way

name: Em Shaeffer
text: Good pizza, bad salad, small selection of sides and appetizers that are mostly some variation of bread and cheese. Slow service (and they brought us several other people's orders beefier getting it right). Art is appropriative and/or offensive in places.

name: Jacquelyn McDaniel
text: came in on a Friday with two friends. The wait a as not to bad and they were on top of table turn around. The waitress was prompt and friendly. Our food took a little longer then we expected but it was worth it. Night consisted of pretzels …More

name: Dustin Burke
text: Nice indoor and outdoor seating. Pizzas are a little expensive but the ingredients are really high quality and the toppings are piled on.

name: Teri Abbey
text: They made us a vegan pizza.

name: Ronak Vaghani
text: Great Pizzas! Super decor!

name: jeanettesdaughter
text: So so. Pizza not what it used to be but a Stella always a stella.

name: Chester Drake
text: Great everything but expensive

name: Timmy S
text: The food here is usually good, just make sure to skip the lunch slices, they come out greasy beyond belief.  The service ranges from decent to horrid. The staff is frequently gathered around the bar venting their frustrations. However, the …More

name: Kimberly Burgess
text: I came here with my girlfriend and had a wonderful time! Friendly and attentive service coupled with great food and smiles made this a wonderful experience. I look forward to returning here the next time I am in town.

name: Brittany McDonald
text: Excellent chill place. Love coming here every day at 4:20 to grab a slice with my honey.

name: Mrs Jacqueline
text: I order pizza from this place frequently (Company events)- I will know longer patronize this business due to customer service (delivery Driver)... You are a product of who you hire especially if you keep them. I'm pretty darn sure this …More

name: Eugene Hodge
text: Best pizza check it out

name: Vincent Holt
text: This pizza is pretty good! Nice outdoor patio. Convenient to Piedmont Park and the Eastside Beltline. Tasty drinks also. There is something about the crust of Mellow Mushroom pizza that is really good!!

name: charles hogan
text: Food is great, even if you have to wait a bit. The longer the wait, the better the food.

name: Rochelle Turner
text: I picked up the shrimp hoagie to go today and literally had to pull all the shrimp off the sandwich due to them being over cooked so severely. The sandwich also had a ton of seasoning on one side-so you couldn't taste anything but that. I …More

name: Brent Green
text: Great vegan options for pies

name: Geraldo Junior
text: Delicious place!

name: Shane Doby
text: Awesome food!!!

name: Bo Lanter
text: Very slow. Absent waiter. Forgot silverware with salads and apps, had to get up and ask. Forgot plates with pizza, had to get up and ask. Had to get up and ask for check. Pizza was just okay. Won't be back.

name: Jarvis Studemire
text: Good Food lazy waitress.

name: Thad Starner
text: Good chain pizza. Fun vibe. Good patio

name: Melanie Frechette
text: Great food, service and cold beer.

name: Neffiteria Acker
text: Service was great... Food even better!

name: Eli Phetteplace
text: Who doesn't love Mellow Mushroom. Great pizza and some great bar games along the way.

name: Nina Chenault
text: Pizza was fresh and very good.I will be back. Great product and price was excellent!!

name: Aaron Kowan
text: Good pizza.  Love the pretzels. Nice patio too.

name: Kristen Walker
text: The calzones are amazing as well as the service!

name: Chad Polstra
text: Lots of great beers on tap and their crust is probably the best wheat based there is.  Also, how can you not like the hippie / stoner thing they have going on?

name: Gabriel Christopher
text: Pizza is awesome with a lot of different options such to choose from. They now do burgers as well but I come for the pizza.

name: Ali Degan
text: How can you not love mellow? Their crust is in a league of its own. Easy location right near piedmont park.

name: Aishah R
text: Placed a phone order.  I noticed on my bank statement I was charged for food I didn't order.  Thank goodness I kept the receipt and was able to get the situation cleared up.

name: Doug Hall
text: This Mellow Mushroom has nice outdoor seating. The shopping center can be crowded and overwhelming though. Also, if you park here, do not leave the shopping center.

name: Jr Thornton
text: For gluten free food great beer great, on certain I went to the bar.    The waitress was useless.  And soooo slow.   I give food a 5, service a 1.

name: Derek Entrekin-Falk
text: Awesome salads and pizza!

name: Dominic Ottaviano
text: Calzone was really good. Our server TJ was great. Definately eat here again.

text: The Vibe... Mellow, Groovy, Neon, Glowing, Round, Magnified, Magnificent Pizza.

text: I always go too thia location for a quick lunch,i bring my family  here and friends usually on the weekends the service is greay and the pizza is heavenly.  But DO  NOT GO HERE DURING THE WEEK. THE CHEF THEY HAVE COOKING DURING THE WEEK …More

name: Shawn Alexander
text: Awesome waiter ,drinks and food

name: Andrew Windsor
